feedback.Physical Object: Included — A discrete, bounded geological specimen.
feedback.Biological/Biomimetic: Excluded — No biological origin or design influence.
feedback.Powered: Excluded — Does not consume or emit energy.
feedback.Structural: Excluded — Not load-bearing or infrastructural in function.
feedback.Observable: Included — Directly viewable and measurable via instrumentation or visually.
feedback.Physical Medium: Included — Composed of physical matter; tangible and space-occupying.
feedback.Active: Excluded — Exhibits no autonomous or internally initiated behavior.
feedback.Intentionally Designed: Excluded — Not shaped or purposed by intent.
feedback.Outputs Effect: Excluded — Does not emit energy or signal in function.
feedback.Processes Signals/Logic: Excluded — No computational or signal-processing role.
feedback.State-Transforming: Excluded — Static and inert without applied external forces.
feedback.Human-Interactive: Excluded — Not designed for interaction (though may be handled).
feedback.System-integrated: Excluded — Not part of an operating system or mechanism.
feedback.Functionally Autonomous: Excluded — No logic or autonomous behavior.
feedback.System-Essential: Excluded — Not critical to a functioning system in isolation.
feedback.Symbolic: Excluded — Any symbolic interpretation is extrinsic.
feedback.Signalling: Excluded — Does not inherently communicate meaning or intent.
feedback.Rule-governed: Excluded — No internal logic or system of rules.
feedback.Compositional: Excluded — Not composed of abstract modules or nested structure.
feedback.Normative: Excluded — Does not prescribe or enforce behaviors.
feedback.Meta: Excluded — Not self-referential or conceptual in form.
feedback.Temporal: Excluded — Not defined by temporal phases or sequence.
feedback.Digital/Virtual: Excluded — A physical object, not a simulated abstraction.
feedback.Social Construct: Excluded — Exists independently of human agreement.
feedback.Institutionally Defined: Excluded — May be cataloged, but not defined in identity by an institution.
feedback.Identity-Linked: Excluded — Not tied to roles, identity, or group membership.
feedback.Regulated: Excluded — Subject to protocol, but regulation is not inherent to the object.
feedback.Economically Significant: Included — High-investment artifact with scientific and financial value.
feedback.Politicised: Included — Central to national prestige, exploration policy, and international rivalry.
feedback.Ritualised: Excluded — Not part of symbolic or ceremonial practice.
feedback.Ethically Significant: Included — Raises critical planetary protection concerns on contamination, custody, and responsibility.

encoding_notes: This encoding isolates the Mars rock sample as a high-significance physical entity, separate from mission or data context. Its extraordinary economic, political, and ethical implications are intrinsic to its presence as a Martian material under Earth custody.
